name: Hentai Ninja
description:
In this very fun game you need to show all your skill with your ninja sword to cut the food and create combos to destroy the censorship and to be able to delight with delicious surprise girls !!! A very cool casual game to play and pass the time !!!

FEATURES

  • You will be excited and relaxed.
  • Surrounding musics.
  • Increasing difficulty.
  • 15 levels for you to show that you are a real ninja
  • Guaranteed fun.
  • Great satisfaction when you break a part of the censorship.
